1 ^ Laŭda: 2 ^ Laŭdábo Dòminum in vita mea~; psallem Deo meo qŭámdiu fúero. ^ I will praise the Lord in my life~; I will sing to my God as long as I shall be.

Dòminum. ^ Praise the Lord: in quìbus non èst salûs. ^ Put not your trust in princes
column5: in whom there is no salvation.

ánima mea: et revertétur in terram suam~; in illa die períbunt òmnes cogitatiónes eórum. ^ His spirit shall go forth
Dòminum. ^ Praise the Lord: and he shall return into his earth~; in that day all their thoughts shall perish.

1 ^ Laŭda: 5 ^ Beátus cujus Deus Jacóbis adjútor ejus
ánima mea: spes ejus in Dòmino Deo ipsíus
Dòminum. ^ Praise the Lord: ^ Blessed is he who hath the God of Jacob for his helper
whose hope is in the Lord his God

Dòminum. ^ Praise the Lord: et òmnia qŭaĕ in eîs sùnt~; qŭi custódit veritátem in sáĕculum
column6: and all things that are in them~; who keepeth truth for ever

ánima mea: dat escam esurièntibus. Dòminus solvit compedítos~; ^ who executeth judgment for them that suffer wrong
Dòminum. ^ Praise the Lord: who giveth food to the hungry. The Lord looseth them that are fettered~;

1 ^ Laŭda: 8 ^ Dòminus illúminat caĕcos~; Dòminus érigit elísos~; Dòminus díligit justos. ^ the Lord enlighteneth the blind~; the Lord lifteth up them that are cast down~; the Lord loveth the just.
9 ^ Dòminus custódit ádvenas~; pupìllum et vìduam suscìpiet
ánima mea: et vias peccatórum dispèrdet. ^ The Lord keepeth the strangers~; he will support the fatherless and the widow
Dòminum. ^ Praise the Lord: and the ways of sinners he will destroy.

1 ^ Laŭda: 10 ^ Regnábit Dòminus in sáĕcula~; Deus tuus
Dòminum. ^ Praise the Lord: in generatiónem et generatiónem. ^ The Lord shall reign for ever~; thy God
